name: You Mug!
description:
WASD or arrow keys to move. E to punch. Space to jump. Shift to crouch.

Collect money and try not to get robbed. Punch robbers or hide behind walls to defend yourself.

Not intended as a real game. May not be kept up or anything. Made for Unity Junior Programmer Course.
